name: Earthscan From Routledge
description:
Building on two centuries' experience, Taylor & Francis which includes the Routledge imprint has grown rapidly over the last two decades to become a leading international academic publisher.The Taylor & Francis Group publishes more than 1000 journals and around 1,800 new books each year, with a books backlist in excess of 20,000 specialist titles of which over 100 titles a a year are in the Built Environment arena. Covering everything from digital architecture to the building regulations. 

www.routledgearchitecture.com

www.tandfbuiltenvironment.com
